item.title: R Package Development
item.description: R packages are the primary mechanism to share R code, data, and documentation with other useRs. This talk walk through the process of creating a new R package including the use of the devtools package, roxygon2 package for documentation, and the pkgdown package for creating websites. We will also discuss how to share packages through Github and/or CRAN. Slides can be viewed here: https://spring2022.data606.net/slides/2022-03-01-R_Package_Development.html#1 Recording of the talk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vlyVKGSVCsk Source code and resources are on Github here: https://github.
